item.title: An Intuitive Understanding of the Fourier Transform
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description: Really nicely, and visually, explained introduction to the Fast Fourier Transform - great stuff!

item.title: Android - High Performance Audio
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description: I’m currently working on a Brillo audio component, which will require very low latency performance. While searching for some tips and prior art, I came across this talk from Google I/O 2013. A bit older now, but provides an excellent overview of the problem domain and approaches to solving those issues..

item.title: Perl and Portaudio
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description:
Super nice demo of algorithmic sound generation with Perl and Portaudio…

from here
